author: @4ian
description:
Manage life points for objects. This can be used for players, enemies, NPCs, or even inanimate objects such as breaking down doors and mining rocks.

Use damage cooldown to prevent further damage during the cooldown. 
Activate shield to protect object.  Any damage greater than shield is applied to object, unless the "Block excess damage" property is enabled.

Properties:
- Health
- Max Health
- Damage Cooldown (seconds)

Conditions:
- Is dead (no health points)
- Is just damaged

Actions:
- Damage the object (reduce health)
- Heal the object (increase health)
- Set current health
- Set maximum health
name: Health
shortDescription: Manage life points and a protective shield

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Manage life points and a protective shield.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Health

events.comment: Correct any values above maximum limits
Only regen when shield is active or when "RegenShieldWhenZeroPoints" is enabled
Correct any values above maximum limits

eventsFunctions.description: Apply damage to the object.  Shield will be damaged first but any excess damage will reduce health and trigger the damage cooldown.
eventsFunctions.name: Hit
eventsFunctions.sentence: Damage _PARAM0_, removing _PARAM2_ points from its health (or shield)

events.comment: Only consider damage if damage cooldown is NOT active
Mark object was hit at least once (used for initial state of damage cooldown)
Restart time since last hit timer
If shield is NOT active, perform normal damage
If shield is active, damage shield first
Excess damage is based on negative shield points
Apply excess damage only if shield does NOT block excess damage

parameters.description: Value of the damage to do (will be removed from object health)
parameters.name: DamageValue

eventsFunctions.description: Change health points.
eventsFunctions.name: SetHealth
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set health of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points

eventsFunctions.description: Heal the object by increasing its life points.
eventsFunctions.name: Heal
eventsFunctions.sentence: Heal _PARAM0_ with _PARAM2_ health points

events.comment: Prevent exceeding max health (unless overhealing is enabled)

parameters.description: Points to heal (will be added to object health)
parameters.name: HealValue

eventsFunctions.description: Change the object maximum health points.
eventsFunctions.name: SetMaxHealth
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set maximum health of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points

eventsFunctions.description: Change the object maximum shield points.
eventsFunctions.name: SetMaxShield
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set maximum shield of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points

eventsFunctions.description: Change rate of shield regeneration.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShieldRegenRate
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set rate of shield regen of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points per second

eventsFunctions.description: Change rate of health regeneration.
eventsFunctions.name: SetHealthRegenRate
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set rate of health regen of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points per second

eventsFunctions.description: Change duration of damage cooldown.
eventsFunctions.name: SetCooldownDuration
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set duration of damage cooldown on _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ seconds

eventsFunctions.description: Change delay before heal regen starts after being hit.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Change delay before heal regen starts
eventsFunctions.name: SetHealthRegenDelay
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set delay before heal regen starts on _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ seconds

eventsFunctions.description: Change delay before shield regen starts after being hit.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Change delay before shield regen starts
eventsFunctions.name: SetShieldRegenDelay
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set delay before shield regen starts on _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ seconds

eventsFunctions.description: Change duration of shield.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShieldDuration
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set duration of shield on _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ seconds

eventsFunctions.description: Activate shield. If the shield was already active, this will reset it's points and timer.
eventsFunctions.name: ActivateShield
eventsFunctions.sentence: Activate (or renew) shield on _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: Change max shield points.  This value is used when the shield is activated or renewed.
eventsFunctions.name: SetMaxShieldPoints
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set max shield of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points

eventsFunctions.description: Shield blocks excess damage when it breaks.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Shield blocks excess damage when it breaks
eventsFunctions.name: BlockExcessDamage
eventsFunctions.sentence: Shield on _PARAM0_ blocks excess damage when it breaks: _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Regen shield when it has zero points.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Regen shield when it has zero points
eventsFunctions.name: RegenShieldWhenZero
eventsFunctions.sentence: Regen shield on _PARAM0_ when it has zero points: _PARAM2_

parameters.description: Regen shield when it has zero points
parameters.name: Value

eventsFunctions.description: Allow over-healing.
eventsFunctions.name: AllowOverHealing
eventsFunctions.sentence: Allow over-healing on _PARAM0_: _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object was just damaged previously in the events.
eventsFunctions.name: IsJustDamaged
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ has just been damaged

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the shield was just damaged previously in the events.
eventsFunctions.name: IsShieldJustDamaged
eventsFunctions.sentence: Shield on _PARAM0_ has just been damaged

eventsFunctions.description: Check if damage cooldown is active.  Object (and shield) cannot be damaged while this is active.
eventsFunctions.name: IsDamageCooldownActive
eventsFunctions.sentence: Damage cooldown on _PARAM0_ is active

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the shield is active (based on shield points and duration)
eventsFunctions.name: IsShieldActive
eventsFunctions.sentence: Shield on _PARAM0_ is active

events.comment: To be considered "active", a shield must have positive points AND not exceed duration
Don't check the timer when duration is zero (or negative)

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object is considered dead (no health points).
eventsFunctions.name: IsDead
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ is dead

eventsFunctions.name: DamageCooldownRemaining

propertyDescriptors.label: Health (life points) (This is also used for starting health)
propertyDescriptors.name: Health

propertyDescriptors.label: Damage cooldown (seconds) Use "0" for no cooldown
propertyDescriptors.name: DamageCooldown

propertyDescriptors.label: Max shield points (Shield will start with this many points when activated)
propertyDescriptors.name: MaxShieldPoints

propertyDescriptors.label: Duration of shield (seconds) Use "0" to disable shield timer
propertyDescriptors.name: ShieldDuration

propertyDescriptors.label: Rate of health regeneration (points per second) (Will not exceed max health, even with overhealing enabled)
propertyDescriptors.name: HealthRegenRate

propertyDescriptors.label: Rate of shield regeneration (points per second)
propertyDescriptors.name: ShieldRegenRate

propertyDescriptors.label: Shield blocks any remaining damage when the shield is destroyed
propertyDescriptors.name: ShieldBlocksExcessDamage

propertyDescriptors.label: Delay (in seconds) before health regen starts after being hit
propertyDescriptors.name: HealthRegenDelay

propertyDescriptors.label: Delay (in seconds) before shield regen starts after being hit
propertyDescriptors.name: ShieldRegenDelay

propertyDescriptors.label: Regen shield when it has zero points
propertyDescriptors.name: RegenShieldWhenZeroPoints

propertyDescriptors.label: Allow heal action to increase health above max health (regen will never exceed max health)
propertyDescriptors.name: AllowOverHealing
